name: HKSample
desc: A HealthKit sample represents a piece of data associated with a start and end time.

items.name: var hasUndeterminedDuration: Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether the sample has an unknown duration.

items.name: let HKSampleSortIdentifierStartDate: String
items.desc: A constant for sorting samples based on their start date.

items.name: let HKSampleSortIdentifierEndDate: String
items.desc: A constant for sorting samples based on their end date.

items.name: let HKPredicateKeyPathStartDate: String
items.desc: The key path for accessing the sample’s start date.

items.name: let HKPredicateKeyPathEndDate: String
items.desc: The key path for accessing the sample’s end date.
